title: SMC_NC_IFunction (Interface)
text:
INTERFACE SMC_NC_IFunction
Interface for functions that can be called from G-Code.
By implementing a function block of this type, it is
possible to add additional functions that can be called in
expressions in the G-Code.
These function blocks need to be passed to the
SMC_ReadNCFile2
or
SMC_ReadNCFromStream
via the input
pCustomFunTable
.
Methods:
Call
GetSignature
Structure:
Call (Method)
GetSignature (Method)
